messages.title: Lib Dems lead the fight to stop Brexit
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats want to stop Brexit. We've been fighting it since the day after the referendum. We are the strongest party of Remain, with a clear and simple message: let's stop Brexit. Jo Swinson said, 'Stopping Brexit means that we can focus on tackling the big issues facing the UK right now. We could build a Britain where we grow our economy, tackle the climate emergency, and address the crises in our NHS and schools.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are committed to stopping Brexit through a clear and simple message.
Focus on growing the economy by stopping Brexit and addressing major issues.
Tackle the climate emergency as part of their broader policy agenda.
Address the crises in NHS and schools by focusing efforts post-Brexit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat Labour here

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats want to stop Brexit. Jo Swinson said, 'Stopping Brexit means that we can focus on tackling the big issues facing the UK right now.'
issues.economy: We could build a Britain where we grow our economy.
issues.education: Address the crises in our schools.
issues.health: Address the crises in our NHS.

quotes.text: 'Jeremy Corbyn refused NINE TIMES to say whether he thought Britain should leave the EU or remain.'
'Labour is proposing to negotiate a new deal with the European Union.'

images.caption: Back the Lib Dems to stop Brexit
